skill.name: clinical-reports
skill.description: Write comprehensive clinical reports including case reports (CARE guidelines), diagnostic reports (radiology/pathology/lab), clinical trial reports (ICH-E3, SAE, CSR), and patient documentation (SOAP, H&P, discharge summaries). Full support with templates, regulatory compliance (HIPAA, FDA, ICH-GCP), and validation tools.
skill.summary: Write comprehensive clinical reports including case reports (CARE guidelines), diagnostic reports (r...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: No data theft, network exfiltration, or malicious execution patterns found. Scripts operate on user provided files and generate local outputs only.

content.value_statement: Clinical reports often miss required sections and compliance checks. This skill provides structured templates and validation tools to improve completeness and privacy.
actual_capabilities: Generate report templates for case reports, SOAP notes, and discharge summaries
Validate case reports against CARE guideline sections
Check HIPAA identifier patterns and age over 89 compliance
Validate CSR structure against ICH E3 sections
Format adverse event CSV data into summary tables
Extract demographics, vitals, and medications from text reports
limitations: Does not provide medical advice or clinical decisions
Does not connect to EHR systems or external databases
Does not generate images without the separate scientific schematics skill
Does not verify data accuracy beyond pattern checks

use_cases.title: Draft a case report
use_cases.description: Create a CARE compliant case report draft with required sections and deidentification checks.

use_cases.title: Build a CSR outline
use_cases.description: Generate an ICH E3 aligned CSR template and validate section coverage.

use_cases.title: Document patient care
use_cases.description: Use SOAP or discharge templates to standardize clinical documentation.

prompt_templates.title: Pick a template
prompt_templates.prompt: List available report templates and create a SOAP note template named new_soap.md.

prompt_templates.title: CARE checklist review
prompt_templates.prompt: Validate this case report for CARE sections and list missing required parts.

prompt_templates.title: HIPAA screen
prompt_templates.prompt: Scan this report text for HIPAA identifiers and summarize risks and fixes.

prompt_templates.title: CSR structure audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Check this CSR draft for ICH E3 sections and report the compliance rate.

output_examples.input: Check my case report for CARE compliance and HIPAA identifiers.
output: CARE compliance: 82 percent, missing Timeline and Informed Consent sections
HIPAA identifiers found: one email address and one full date
Recommendation: add missing sections and remove identifiers

best_practices: Use templates from assets to start each report type
Run deidentification checks before sharing drafts
Document consent statements explicitly in case reports
anti_patterns: Uploading raw patient identifiers into reports
Skipping required sections for CARE or ICH E3 compliance
Using prohibited abbreviations from the do not use list

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill provides text templates and local scripts that work with these platforms.

faq.question: What are the report size limits?
faq.answer: There are no fixed limits, but large files may reduce performance during checks.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my EHR or data warehouse?
faq.answer: No, it only reads local files and does not connect to external systems.

faq.question: How is patient data handled?
faq.answer: Processing is local to your files. No network calls or uploads are included.

faq.question: What if a script fails or reports errors?
faq.answer: Verify the input file path and format, then rerun with the correct file.

faq.question: How does it compare to manual checklists?
faq.answer: It automates section and identifier checks, but still requires human clinical review.
